name: Sunken Treasure Fleets
description: Multiple ships that have sunk together provide extensive underwater archaeological sites with valuable cargo. The multiple shipwrecks and historical significance attract treasure hunters and archaeologists, while the underwater environment and potential marine threats create constant danger.
atmosphere: Multiple wrecks create an underwater battlefield of sunken vessels while treasure spills from countless broken holds. Historical fleet preserved by cold depths as marine growth covers the maritime graveyard. Massive archaeological site beneath the waves. Fortune and tragedy intertwined in the abyssal cemetery.
